amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute clarifies the exemptions provided in Federal securities laws for charitable organizations.
amendment.purpose: An amendment in the nature of a substitute to replace the amendments recommended by the report of the Committee on Commerce.

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Bliley.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bliley amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
